channel.title: Jss on Rob J Hyndman
channel.description: Recent content in Jss on Rob J Hyndman

item.title: Publishing an R package in the Journal of Statistical Software
item.description: I’ve been an editor of JSS for the last few years, and as a result I tend to get email from people asking me about publishing papers describing R packages in JSS. So for all those wondering, here are some general comments.JSS prefers to publish papers about packages where the package is on CRAN and has been there long enough to have matured (i.e., obvious bugs ironed out and a few active users).
